attributes.action: make teachers use their holiday for training,not my childs term time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we are always being lectured about taking children out of school during the term,and are actually treated like criminals when we do,we are also told that even a few days a term can be detrimental to their learning,and are told we have no right to decide when and how they will be sent to school (even though without the parents there would be no children to school!!!) and then when i received my daughters "booklet" highlighting important school dates,i have noticed that she will be missing 5 days due to teacher training,and a day off for polling day.now surely with 12 weeks holiday a year they could find time to have some training out of term time?
is it the old one rule for me and another for you game???
